name: gifted-md
description: I am Gifted-Md, a Simple WhatsApp Bot built with NodeJs to Enhance WhatsApp Communication experience

SESSION_ID.description: Put your session-id here. Must Start with 'Gifted~'

MODE.description: Set Mode  to 'public' to work in all chats only, 'inbox' to work in pm(inbox) chats only or 'private' to work for you only. Default is 'public'. You can set up this later using .mode private/inbox/group/public

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put only one Owner Number Here ie 2547xxxxx

SUDO_NUMBERS.description: Put Sudo Numbers separated by comma Here ie 2547xxxx,2557xxxxx,928xxxxx. Sudos have same rights as owner(can command the bot)

CHAT_BOT.description: Put value to 'true' to enablle for all chats or 'inbox' to ebanle in pm(inbox) chats only or 'groups' to enable in groups only else false. You can set up this later using .chatbot on/inbox/groups/off

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Make it 'true' if you want bot to view statuses. You can set up this later using .autoview on/off

AUTO_LIKE_STATUS.description: Make it 'true' if you want bot to read and like statuses. You can set up this later using .autolike on/off

AUTO_LIKE_EMOJI.description: Input your custom status like emoji(any) else leave blank to use default => ğŸ’œ

AUTO_REPLY_STATUS.description: Make it 'true' if you want the bot to send message after viewing status

STATUS_REPLY_MSG.description: Set your status reply message to be sent after bot views status

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: Enter value to 'true' for blueticking all messages, or 'commands' for blueticking only commands else false. You can set up this later using .autoread on/commands/off

PRESENCE.description: Put 'online' for always online, 'typing' for always typing a message, 'recording' for always recording audio or 'null' to maintain your presence. You can set up this later using .presence typing/recording/online/null

WELCOME.description: Put 'true' if you want the bot to automatically welcome participants whenever they join a group

GOODBYE.description: Put 'true' if you want the bot to automatically send goodbye message whenever participants leave/exit a group

ANTILINK.description: Enter 'true' to delete links and kick the user automatically or 'delete' to delete the links without kicking the user or 'warn' to warn users 3 times before kicking them. You can set up this later using .antilink kick/warn/delete/remove

ANTIBAD.description: Enter 'true' to automatically delete bad words sent by users in groups. You can set up this later using .antibad on/off

BAD_WORDS.description: Enter bad words separated by a comma(will be deleted if ANTIBAD is set to true)

AUTO_AUDIO.description: Put 'true' if you want the bot to automatically send audio in chat if you use  words such as: hi, hello, good morning, good night. You can set up this later using .autoaudio on/off

TIME_ZONE.description: Put your timezone or leave to default if you do not know

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Provide country codes you want the bot to automatically block

API_KEY.description: You can enter your premium unlimited api key here to avoid inconveniences

AUTO_REACT.description: Put 'true' if you want the bot to auto react to messages. You can set up this later using .autoreact on/off

ANTICALL.description: Make it 'true' if you want to automatically reject calls. You can set up this later using .anticall on/off

ANTICALL_MSG.description: Put Your own Anticall Message the bot will send after rejecting calls
ANTICALL_MSG.value: *_ğŸ“ Auto Call Reject Mode Activated by Gifted-Md. ğŸ“µ No Calls Allowed Dude!_*

BOT_NAME.description: You can edit this but maintain font style for uniformity. Use 'Fonts Type Keyboard' for styles.

BOT_PIC.description: You can edit this but it must be a valid image url(link).

PACK_AUTHOR.description: You can enter your sticker pack author

PACK_NAME.description: You can enter your sticker pack name.

PREFIX.description: Your Bot Prefix (default: .) You can put your own custom prefix
